Package com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.event.request

Bean classes which represent the business objects sent to the VMG /events/v1/ API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EventFundraiserSortCriteria Contains the values needed to sort fundraiser pages for an event via various calls in ConnectEventAPI
EventSearchCriteria Bean class to pass search parameters to the Event Search API call ConnectEventAPI.searchEvents(EventSearchCriteria)
 

Enum Summary
EventFundraiserSortCriteria.SortField Enumerates the sort field for the fundraiser details which will be returned
EventFundraiserSortCriteria.SortOrder Enumerates the sort order for the EventFundraiserSortCriteria.SortField
 

Package com.virginmoneygiving.connect.sdk.v1.beans.event.request Description

Bean classes which represent the business objects sent to the VMG /events/v1/ API.
